name: tassl-postgrest-client
description: Advanced client for the PostgREST API
author: Caleb Meredith <calebmeredith8@gmail.com>

scripts.build: $(npm bin)/babel lib -d dist/lib && MINIFY=false $(npm bin)/webpack && MINIFY=true $(npm bin)/webpack
scripts.preversion: git checkout master && npm run lint && npm test && npm run build && git add dist
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags && npm publish
